<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Scarecrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=929) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Bellflower Tiller](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=23)

**Prerequisites**
[Bellflower Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=928)

</column>

---

You fight fiercely to protect your crop. When you hit a creature that is adjacent to two or more members of your crop with a weapon or unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to your damage roll equal to the number of weapon damage dice. When you hit a creature who has a member of your crop grabbed, that member can attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) using a reaction.
name: Scarecrow
